name: Best Kept Secret

config_properties.name: Best Kept Secret
config_properties.description: An indie music festival in Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands, featuring alternative, indie rock, and electronic music.

ai_profile:
**Best Kept Secret 2026: A Celebration of Diversity and Genre-Bending Sounds**

The 2026 edition of *Best Kept Secret* brings together an eclectic mix of 52 artists, showcasing an impressive array of genres and styles. From the pulsating beats of electronic and house to the raw energy of post-punk, hip-hop, and alternative rock, the festival offers something for every music lover. Notable trends this year include a strong representation of indie rock and its subgenres, alongside emerging sounds like Afro-psychedelic funk and traditional South African music, reflecting the festival’s commitment to both innovation and global inclusivity.

This year’s lineup spans 16 countries, with acts hailing from the USA, the Netherlands, and the UK leading the charge, alongside representation from Ghana, South Africa, Brazil, and beyond. The festival celebrates diversity not only in geography but also in identity, with artists representing male (24), female (9), non-binary (1), and mixed-gender groups (9). Additionally, 12 artists identify as people of color, further underscoring the festival’s dedication to amplifying diverse voices and perspectives in the music scene.

With an average rating of 7.2 and a high percentage of artists rated between 7 and 9, *Best Kept Secret 2026* promises a lineup of critically acclaimed talent. From established stars to fresh, boundary-pushing acts, the festival continues to honor its reputation as a haven for music discovery. With every artist linked on Spotify, attendees will have the perfect opportunity to explore and curate their own festival experience ahead of time. This year’s edition is set to be an unforgettable celebration of music, culture, and creative expression.
